t: Amazon Is Shutting Down Freevee, Its Ad-Supported Video Streamer
s: November 12, 2024 - Freevee is the name of the ad-supported video on demand (AVOD) service that was originally launched in January 2019 under the name IMDb Freedive and then rebranded as IMDb TV in June of that year. Freevee has been housed within the Amazon MGM Studios group.

s: Amazon Freevee was a free, ad-supported video streaming service available in the United States and U.S Territories. Amazon Freevee content has been replaced with "Watch For Free" on Prime Video.

t: Everything you need to know about Amazon Freevee
s: December 22, 2023 - Prime Video offers a massive library of movies, series, and sports.

Amazon is dropping the Freevee brand of its free online video service after five years. The service, part of the IMDb business owned by Amazon, was rebranded Freevee in 2022. It will now be folded into Amazon Prime Video.

BUCK helped relaunch IMDb TV as Amazon Freevee. We collaborated on everything to shape the brand’s personality on and offline. We’re especially proud of the expressive type system and motion language we developed to embody the free spirit of the streaming service.
